pr_title: Show useful error when col version is too high

timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: As mentioned elsewhere, I'd prefer if the thing wasn't a possible null boxed value and was either a real value or a constant for unknown (-1) with actual exceptions and handling in case things are unrecoverably busted
replies.author: mikehardy

replies.author: mikehardy

timeline.bodyText: would prefer a constant -1 int unknown, and a real value here. It's a concrete thing the idea of a version, and seems like it should be strictly known as a real integer or a known constant (-1) that is unknown, with a real Exception if it's unrecoverably busted. I just don't like Nulls really, I'll admit it.
